title: Why Flipkart is chosen to sell pixel 4a and not Amazon because Flipkart is very poor.
content: I have been try to order the Google Pixel 4a since 16th October from Flipkart. But the site says it is coming soon or undeliverable to my pincode. I stay in Pune and I can see the comments on the purchase page of Flipkart that are from Pune and yet not deliverable to me. Why such ?
